titleInfo.title: [Letter] 1840 Sept. 17 [to] Mary Jane Chester, Columbia, Ten[nessee]

mods.note: This document is a letter written by Elizabeth Chester to her daughter, Mary Jane Chester, on September 17, 1840. In the letter, Elizabeth wishes good health to her daughter, and expresses her and her family`s desire to see Mary Jane soon. Elizabeth writes of missing her daughter, the sickness of a dear relative, and information concerning the relocation of some of Mary Jane`s friends.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
